dublin_core.dcvalue: Focused assessment with sonography for trauma FAST examination has been proved accurate for diagnosing trauma when performed by nonradiologist physicians Recent reports have suggested that nonphysicians also may be able to perform the FAST examination reliably A multipurpose ultrasound system is installed on the International Space Station as a component of the Human Research Facility Nonphysician crew members aboard the International Space Station receive modest training in hardware operation sonographic techniques and remotely guided scanning This report documents the first FAST examination conducted in space as part of the sustained effort to maintain the highest possible level of available medical care during long duration space flight
FAST at MACH 20: clinical ultrasound aboard the International Space Station.
